name: Rana
appearance: Shaved head, copper throat-chimes, and inked staves of music along her wrists; a singer’s lungs and a steepled posture.
character: Disciplined and proud of her choir; reverent toward the river’s music and ruthless toward anything off-tempo.
talents: Matches the river’s buried choir at low tide
Projects speech through pipes across the weir
dreams: Discover the unknown note haunting a song-gate
Compose a hymn that heals cracked sluice-stone
Lead a flood-hymn before the Conclave
secrets: Heard the unknown note in a dream and lost her lover’s name to it
Hides a riverbell shard inside her chime collar
Sometimes opens a gate half a note early to test echoes
